articles.title: Jeff Bezos applauds Buhari’s climate change agenda - P.M. News
articles.description: American billionaire Jeff Bezos, commends President Muhammadu Buhari's leadership role in restoring degraded lands in the country.
articles.content:
American billionaire Jeff Bezos, on Monday in Glasgow, Scotland commended President Muhammadu Buhari’s leadership role in restoring degraded lands in the country.
Bezos described Buhari’s commitment… [+1692 chars]

articles.title: American Airlines cancels nearly 850 flights on Sunday - News24
articles.description: American Airlines canceled nearly 850 domestic and international flights on Sunday, citing staffing shortages and unfavorable weather, pushing total cancellations to 1 739 and counting since Friday.
